name: laxar-media-widget
description: Displays an image or an external website.

medium.description: Identifies which media content to display.

resource.description: A resource topic under which a document resource can be obtained.

showTitle.description: If available, show a title above the media content.

showCaption.description: If available, show a caption below the media content.

onActions.description: List of actions, any of which triggers loading media content. If omitted, content is loaded immediately.

items.description: An action that triggers loading media content.

layout.description: Tells how the display size is calculated.

sizeToContent.description: If true, the media content determines the rendering size (container otherwise).

fallback.description: Allow to open content in a new browser-window on specific platforms.

i18nHtmlText.description: Text to display on the fallback-link.

default.en: Please click here to display the document!
default.de: Bitte klicken, um das Dokument anzuzeigen!

integration.description: Allow to integrate with embedded websites (applicable to website mime-types only).

name.description: The window.name that is visible to any embedded website.

i18n.description: Which locale to use for displaying this widget.

locale.description: The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.
